nodes.text: Kotab was a planet that was the homeworld of the sentient Kotabi bond-twins Ceret and Terec.

Kotab was first mentioned in a StarWars.com article previewing the comic The High Republic 2, the first appearance of the twins. Although the article said that Kotab was the twins' homeworld, the novel The High Republic: The Rising Storm later said they were from Sagamore.
